'''Glittering Gemstones''' is a food item that the player can [[cook]]. The [[recipe]] for Glittering Gemstones is obtainable from Level 2 [[Reputation]] with [[Children of Echoes]].

Depending on the quality, Glittering Gemstones heals the target [[Character]] for 1 HP every 8 seconds for '''32'''/'''40'''/'''48''' seconds, while briefly displaying the logo of the ''Children of Echoes''. This effect will only activate when the selected character is also the active character. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
